hours_text:
Menu

# Hours + Admission

## **HOURS**

**Sun - Tues** CLOSED**  
Wed - Sat** 11am - 4pm

**Special Holiday Open Weekends (Sat & Sun):** Nov 29-30 and Dec 13-14. 

**Closed:** Easter, New Years Eve, New Year’s Day, Easter, Independence Day, Thanksgiving, December 25-26, New Year’s Eve, & New Year’s Day

**Special Closure:** The Museum will be closed for gallery updates from December 28 to January 16, 2026. We’ll reopen on Saturday, January 17. 

## 

## **ADMISSION**

Kids (0-4 years): **NO CHARGE  
** Students (5-17 years): **FREE FOR THE HOLIDAYS!  
** Adults/Seniors: **FREE FOR THE HOLIDAYS!**

[**_Members are always FREE._**](/membership-options)**  
2026:_2nd Saturdays_** of the month are FREE.

**_Library Pass Program_** \- Check out a FREE pass at your Pierce County Library

The Harbor History Museum proudly participates in **_Museums For All,_** providing**** FREE admission with your EBT/SNAP card.

_Holiday free admission sponsored by the Gig Harbor Lodging Tax Fund._

[ ](https://www.facebook.com/HarborHistoryMuseum) [ ](http://instagram.com/harborhistorymuseum) [ ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMJyS0on1zyH83w0faWKl7w)
